title: Destiny Interrupted
description: If something is truly meant to be, could dire circumstances stop it from happening?It's been over two long years since Whitney Hunsaker has seen Trevor Matthews. Does she dare garner the courage to face him after the unforeseen circumstances that tore them apart? Will Trevor reject her friendship or will their once-promising relationship carry them through the hardships they must face in order to overcome the past and move forward with their lives?Destiny Interrupted is a testament to the idea that true love can transcend any tragedy.
author: Ruth Davidson
